mapper.insert: INSERT INTO asm_attrs (asm_id, name, label, type, options, required, value, large_value) VALUES (#{asmId}, #{name}, #{label}, #{type}, #{options}, #{required}, #{value}, #{largeValue})
mapper.update: UPDATE asm_attrs a1 SET a1.ordinal = (SELECT a2.ordinal FROM asm_attrs a2 WHERE a2.ordinal IN (#{ordinal1}, #{ordinal2}) AND a1.ordinal != a2.ordinal) WHERE a1.ordinal IN (#{ordinal1}, #{ordinal2})
